LanguageData.ARA_DropPod.label: Arachne air sac species
LanguageData.ARA_DropPod.description: It is a gigantic Arachne worm that can store a large amount of supplies and insects in its internal cavity; it uses its internal air sacs to rise into the air and fly to its destination on the world map. However, it self-destructs upon landing.\n\nCompared to the drop pods used by humans, air sacs do not require fuel and cost less.
LanguageData.ARA_ActiveDropPod.label: Arachne air sac species
LanguageData.ARA_DropPodLeaving.label: Arachne air sac species (takeoff)
LanguageData.ARA_DropPodIncoming.label: Arachne air sac species (landing)
